response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product not only stands as a testament to quality but also embodies innovation and functionality. Given its exceptional features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $120. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this fantastic deal.", "product_price": 150}
